sqlMap.select:
SELECT menuname, price, comment1, comment2, phone, acctime, orderindex, to_char(rdate,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi')rdate, userid FROM progressorder
where storeunq = '236' order by rdate desc

SELECT comment1, comment2, price, menuname, orderindex, to_char(rdate+acctime/(24*60),'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi')acctime, dctime, method, phone, to_char(rdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi')rdate, addr FROM progressorder
where storeunq = '236' order by rdate desc

SELECT orderindex, menuname, map, addr, userid, phone, storeunq, decode(acctime,null,'승인대기중',to_char(rdate+acctime/(24*60),'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi')) acctime
FROM progressorder WHERE userid=#userid# AND receive='P'

SELECT p.userid, p.orderindex, p.menuname, p.price, decode(p.receive,'P','배달중','Y','배달완료') receive, decode(p.acctime,null,'승인대기중',to_char(p.rdate+p.acctime/(24*60),'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi')) acctime, p.storeunq, s.storename, decode(s.storeimage,null,'사진',s.storeimage) storeimage, to_char(s.rdate,'yy/mm/dd (dy)') rdate, decode(p.map,null,'사진',p.map) map
FROM progressorder p, store s WHERE p.storeunq = s.storeunq AND p.userid=#userid# ORDER BY rdate DESC

select p.userid, p.orderindex, p.storeunq, decode(p.acctime,null,'승인대기중',to_char(p.rdate+p.acctime/(24*60),'MM/DD am hh:mi')) acctime, s.storename, p.menuname, to_char(p.rdate,'YYYY"년 "MM" 월"DD" 일" am hh:mi') rdate, p.price, decode(upper(p.method),'K','카카오페이','N','네이버페이','C','카드결제') method, substr(p.addr,9) addr, p.phone, decode(p.comment1,null,'요청사항 없음.',p.comment1) comment1, decode(p.comment2,null,'요청사항 없음.',p.comment2) comment2, s.storephone, s.storelongitude, s.storelatitude from progressorder p, store s where p.storeunq = s.storeunq and p.userid=#userid# and p.orderindex=#orderindex#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO progressorder (orderindex, menuname, price, comment1, comment2, phone, map, addr, method, rdate, storeunq, userid) VALUES (progressorder_seq.nextval, #menuname#, #price#, #comment1#, #comment2#, #phone#, null, #addr#, 'K', sysdate, #storeunq#, #userid#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE progressorder SET acctime= '$acctime$', dctime= '$dctime$'
WHERE orderindex = '$orderindex$'
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM preorder WHERE userid = #userid# and storeunq = #storeunq#
